bibl.title: From Hellenism to Islam. Cultural and Linguistic Change in the Roman Near East
bibl.note: [Introduction.] - The Magical Texts from the Cairo Genizah: A Brief Overview. - Early and Late in Genizah Magical Texts. - The Transformation of the Jewish Magical Tradition from Late Antiquity to the Cairo Genizah.
bibl.seg: BOHAK Gideon, The Jewish Magical Tradition from Late Antique Palestine to the Cairo Genizah.
Hannah M. COTTON, Robert G. HOYLAND, Jonathan J. PRICE and David J. WASSERSTEIN (Edd.), From Hellenism to Islam. Cultural and Linguistic Change in the Roman Near East (Cambridge, 2009) pp. 324-342.
